name: Research is strange
description:
Participate in the research about medical care in a Visual Novel. Play the role of patient or doctor. 

"Research is strange" was created by Sulliman Abdul, Pierre Baudoin, Nolan Gougeon, Thibault Le Gorju, Judicaëlle Live Lun and Daphné Renauld, and frame-by-frame and Hand drawn animation.  

This game was developped during the Medical Game Jam 2019 organised by the Assistance Publique - Hôpitaux de Paris, ComPaRe (Community of patient for the research), the Chaire Public Trust in Health and the Association Enjeu of Grenoble Management School.
